name: PHO TACOS
desc: beef brisket in a warm flour tortilla, topped with green and white onion, cilantro and bean sprouts, drizzled with hoisin and sriracha sauce

name: EGG ROLLS
desc: deep fried rolls with vermicelli, lettuce, cilantro and pickled carrots,served with our homemade house sauce

name: SPRING ROLLS
desc: rice paper wrapped rolls with vermicelli, lettuce, shallots, bean sprouts and mint, served with our homemade peanut sauce

name: CRISPY CALAMARI
desc: calamari strips deep fried in a delicate batter seasoned with salt and pepper, sautéed with garlic, onion and jalapeños, served with a sweet chili sauce

name: CHICKEN WINGS
desc: wings deep fried in a delicate batter seasoned with salt and pepper, sautéed with garlic, onion and jalapenos, served with a sweet chili sauce

name: CRISPY SHRIMP
desc: de-shelled shrimp deep fried in a delicate batter seasoned with salt and pepper, sautéed with garlic, onion and jalapeños, served with a sweet chili sauce

name: HOUSE SALAD
desc: diced cabbage with mint, onion, pickled carrots, shallots and crushed peanuts, served with our house vinaigrette dressing
